item.title: News Regarding the Health Effects of the Olympics
item.description: Hello everyone, here are some news about the health effects of the Beijing Olympics. N-IUSSP Olympic Games help children grow up healthy Blog of British Journal of Sports Medicine What is the association between Olympic Games and children???s growth? Looking at evidence from China Peking University ????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
